verses.verse: I <WG1473> therefore <WG3767>, the prisoner <WG1198> of <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, beg <WG3870> you <WG5209> that you walk <WG4043> worthy <WG516> of the calling <WG2821> with which <WG3739> you are called <WG2564>,
With <WG3326> all <WG3956> lowliness <WG5012> and <WG2532> meekness <WG4236>, with <WG3326> longsuffering <WG3115>, forbearing <WG430> one another <WG240> in <WG1722> love <WG26>;
Endeavouring <WG4704> to keep <WG5083> the unity <WG1775> of the Spirit <WG4151> in <WG1722> the bond <WG4886> of peace <WG1515>.

There is one <WG1520> body <WG4983>, and <WG2532> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151>, even <WG2532> as <WG2531> you are called <WG2564> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> hope <WG1680> of your <WG5216> calling <WG2821>;
One <WG1520> Lord <WG2962>, one <WG1520> faith <WG4102>, one <WG1520> baptism <WG908>,

One <WG1520> God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of all <WG3956>, who <WG3588> is above <WG1909> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> through <WG1223> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> all <WG3956>.
But <WG1161> unto every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of us <WG2257> is given <WG1325> grace <WG5485> according to <WG2596> the measure <WG3358> of the gift <WG1431> of Christ <WG5547>.

Therefore <WG1352> he says <WG3004>, When he ascended <WG305> up <WG1519> on high <WG5311>, he led <WG162> captivity <WG161> captive <WG162>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> gifts <WG1390> unto men <WG444>.

(Now <WG1161> that <WG3588> he ascended <WG305>, what <WG5101> is it <WG2076> <WG99999> but <WG3361> that <WG3754> he <WG2597> also <WG2532> descended <WG2597> first <WG4412> into <WG1519> the lower <WG2737> parts <WG3313> of the earth <WG1093>?

He that <WG3588> descended <WG2597> is <WG2076> the same <WG846> also <WG2532> that <WG3588> ascended up <WG305> far above <WG5231> all <WG3956> heavens <WG3772>, that <WG2443> he might fill <WG4137> all things <WG3956>.)

And <WG2532> he <WG846> gave <WG1325> some <WG3303>, apostles <WG652>; and <WG1161> some <WG3588>, prophets <WG4396>; and <WG1161> some <WG3588>, evangelists <WG2099>; and <WG1161> some <WG3588>, pastors <WG4166> and <WG2532> teachers <WG1320>;
For <WG4314> the perfecting <WG2677> of the saints <WG40>, for <WG1519> the work <WG2041> of the ministry <WG1248>, for <WG1519> the edifying <WG3619> of the body <WG4983> of Christ <WG5547>:

Until <WG3360> we <WG2658> all <WG3956> come <WG2658> in <WG1519> the unity <WG1775> of the faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> of the knowledge <WG1922> of the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, unto <WG1519> a perfect <WG5046> man <WG435>, unto <WG1519> the measure <WG3358> of the stature <WG2244> of the fullness <WG4138> of Christ <WG5547>:

That <WG2443> we <WG5600> henceforth would be <WG5600> no more <WG3371> children <WG3516>, tossed to and fro <WG2831>, and <WG2532> carried about <WG4064> with every <WG3956> wind <WG417> of doctrine <WG1319>, by <WG1722> the trickery <WG2940> of men <WG444>, and <WG1722> skillful craftiness <WG3834>, by which <WG4314> they <WG3588> lie in wait <WG3180> to deceive <WG4106>;

But <WG1161> speaking the truth <WG226> in <WG1722> love <WG26>, may grow up <WG837> into <WG1519> him <WG846> in all things <WG3956>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776>, even Christ <WG5547>:

From <WG1537> whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> body <WG4983> fitly joined together <WG4883> and <WG2532> knitted <WG4822> by <WG1223> that which <WG3588> every <WG3956> joint <WG860> supplies <WG2024>, according to <WG2596> the effectual working <WG1753> in <WG1722> the measure <WG3358> <WG99999> of every <WG1538> part <WG3313>, makes <WG4160> the body <WG4983> increase <WG838> to <WG1519> the building <WG3619> up of itself <WG1438> in <WG1722> love <WG26>.

This <WG5124> I say <WG3004> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> testify <WG3143> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, that you <WG5209> henceforth <WG2532> walk <WG4043> not <WG3371> as <WG2531> other <WG3062> Gentiles <WG1484> walk <WG4043>, in <WG1722> the vanity <WG3153> of their <WG846> mind <WG3563>,

Having the understanding <WG1271> darkened <WG4654>, being <WG5607> alienated <WG526> from the life <WG2222> of God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the ignorance <WG52> that is <WG5607> in <WG1722> them <WG846>, because <WG1223> of the blindness <WG4457> of their <WG846> heart <WG2588>:

Who <WG3748> being past feeling <WG524> have given <WG3860> themselves <WG1438> over <WG3860> unto lasciviousness <WG766>, to <WG1519> work <WG2039> all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167> with <WG1722> greediness <WG4124>.
But <WG1161> you <WG5210> have <WG3129> not <WG3756> so <WG3779> learned <WG3129> Christ <WG5547>;
If so be that <WG1489> you have heard <WG191> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> have been taught <WG1321> by <WG1722> him <WG846>, as <WG2531> the truth <WG225> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> Jesus <WG2424>:

That you <WG5209> put off <WG659> concerning <WG2596> the former <WG4387> conversation <WG391> the old <WG3820> man <WG444>, which is <WG3588> corrupt <WG5351> according to <WG2596> the deceitful <WG539> lusts <WG1939>;
And <WG1161> be renewed <WG365> in the spirit <WG4151> of your <WG5216> mind <WG3563>;

And <WG2532> that you put on <WG1746> the new <WG2537> man <WG444>, which <WG3588> after <WG2596> God <WG2316> is created <WG2936> in <WG1722> righteousness <WG1343> and <WG2532> true <WG225> holiness <WG3742>.

Therefore <WG1352> putting away <WG659> lying <WG5579>, speak <WG2980> every man <WG1538> truth <WG225> with <WG3326> his <WG846> neighbor <WG4139>: for <WG3754> we are <WG2070> members <WG3196> one of another <WG240>.
Be angry <WG3710>, and <WG2532> sin <WG264> not <WG3361>: let <WG1931> not <WG3361> the sun <WG2246> go down <WG1931> upon <WG1909> your <WG5216> wrath <WG3950>:
Neither <WG3383> give <WG1325> place <WG5117> to the devil <WG1228>.

Let him <WG2813> that <WG3588> stole <WG2813> steal <WG2813> no more <WG3371>: but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> let him <WG2872> labor <WG2872>, working <WG2038> with <WG5495> his hands <WG5495> the thing which is <WG3588> good <WG18>, that <WG2443> he may have <WG2192> to give <WG3330> to him that <WG3588> has <WG2192> needs <WG5532>.

Let <WG1607> <WG99999> no <WG3361> corrupt <WG4550> communication <WG3056> proceed <WG1607> out of <WG1537> your <WG5216> mouth <WG4750>, but <WG235> that <WG1487> which is <WG5100> good <WG18> to <WG4314> the use <WG5532> of edifying <WG3619>, that <WG2443> it may minister <WG1325> grace <WG5485> unto the hearers <WG191>.
And <WG2532> grieve <WG3076> not <WG3361> the holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG1722>, by which <WG3739> you are sealed <WG4972> unto <WG1519> the day <WG2250> of redemption <WG629>.

Let <WG142> all <WG3956> bitterness <WG4088>, and <WG2532> wrath <WG2372>, and <WG2532> anger <WG3709>, and <WG2532> clamour <WG2906>, and <WG2532> evil speaking <WG988>, be put away <WG142> from <WG575> you <WG5216>, with <WG4862> all <WG3956> malice <WG2549>:

And <WG1161> be <WG1096> kind <WG5543> one <WG240> to <WG1519> another <WG240>, tenderhearted <WG2155>, forgiving <WG5483> one another <WG1438>, even <WG2532> as <WG2531> God <WG2316> for <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>'s sake has forgiven <WG5483> you <WG5213>.
